definition: (of persons) free from external control and constraint in e.g. action and judgment
details:
adjective
- (of persons) free from external control and constraint in e.g. action and judgment
= synonyms: self-directed, self-reliant
- existing as an independent entity
= example: existing as an independent entity
- of political bodies, not controlled by outside forces
= example: of political bodies, not controlled by outside forces
= synonyms: independent
